Detailed Description

An abstract definition of a simple Dynamic Variable. This simply defines an m_value_type that changes over time. Any implemention that derives from DynamicVariable can be added.
Author:
Braden Kowitz

Definition at line 55 of file DynamicVariable.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DynamicVariable::DynamicVariable (   ) 
 

Default constructor for DynamicVariables. Sets the length to 1 second. Sets the rate to DEFAULT_SAMPLING_RATE
